title: AI Feature Productization
shortDescription: Transform AI/ML prototypes into production-ready product features.
description: Comprehensive guide for taking AI and machine learning capabilities from research or prototype stage to fully productized features. This playbook addresses the unique challenges of AI products including model performance metrics, bias detection, explainability, edge cases, user trust, and safe rollout strategies. Critical for PMs at AI-first companies building intelligent automation.

prompts.note: Conduct AI-specific user research to understand trust, AI literacy, and human-AI interaction patterns
Create comprehensive PRD for AI feature including model requirements and AI interaction design
Conduct thorough AI/ML risk assessment: bias, drift, hallucination, explainability, adversarial attacks
Define model performance metrics, thresholds, SLAs, and acceptance criteria
Design production-ready AI inference APIs with async patterns, confidence scores, and versioning
Design data schema for training data, predictions, feedback loops, and audit trails
Create comprehensive ML testing strategy: accuracy, bias, robustness, and production validation
Plan phased AI rollout with shadow mode, confidence ramps, and human-in-the-loop transitions

prerequisites: Working AI/ML prototype or proof of concept
Access to training data and initial model performance metrics
Alignment with ML/AI engineering team on technical feasibility
Understanding of model limitations, edge cases, and failure modes
Stakeholder buy-in for phased rollout approach
outcomes: AI-specific user research insights on trust and adoption patterns
Production-ready AI feature PRD with model requirements
Comprehensive AI/ML risk register with mitigations
Model performance metrics, thresholds, and SLAs
AI service API specification with async and streaming support
ML testing framework covering accuracy, bias, and robustness
Phased rollout plan with confidence ramps and rollback procedures
